alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Phelps (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 16 at 4:20PM CDT until June 16 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Nebraska, including the following counties, Buffalo and Phelps. * WHEN...Until 815 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. One to two inches of rainfall has already fallen over the past hour, and additional rainfall is possible. As a result, minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Odessa and Amherst. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
